name: df-ina
body: |- wceq(cina, cab(s0, w3a(wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wceq(cfv(ccf, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wral(s1, cv(s0), wbr(cpw(cv(s1)), csdm, cv(s0))))))
comment: An ordinal is strongly inaccessible iff it is a regular strong limit cardinal, which is to say that it dominates the powersets of every smaller ordinal. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jun-2013.)
